CustomField.description: Defines if the required Hours/Days for and Allowance will reset each time it is paid. When Yes, once and Allowance is paid, the Employee must work the required hours/days before it is paid again.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines if the required Hours/Days for and Allowance will reset each time it is paid. When Yes, once and Allowance is paid, the Employee must work the required hours/days before it is paid again.
CustomField.label: Reset After Payment
